meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Megan Davenport Judy Nichols Sean Hansen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6354.

td.p: Megan Davenport, an administrative coordinator and graduate student from Ruston, Louisiana
Judy Nichols, a mystery writer from Wilmington, North Carolina
Sean Hansen, an assistant professor of management information systems originally from Cleveland, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $30,001)

tr.td: CASHMERE
NOVEL VOCABULARY
REVOLUTION
INTERVIEWING THE INTERVIEWER
WOMEN ON TV
A STATE OF...

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Cashmere comes from the downy undercoat of the Kashmir type of this animal')

tr.td: Cashmere comes from the downy undercoat of the Kashmir type of this animal

tr.td: Sean
Judy
Megan
MERE CASH
GEOLOGY

POLAR EXPLORATION
WITHOUT MY PARTNER
(Alex: Each response will be half of a famous duo.)
